add.description: Add product to cart with default quantity of 1. This specific endpoint path and default quantity behavior must be explicitly documented in the LLD API specifications section.
add.location: Section 5: API Specifications - Shopping Cart APIs
add.rationale: Story SCRUM-1140 requires this exact API contract with default quantity behavior. LLD must specify the endpoint path, request/response schemas, and default quantity logic.

add.description: Retrieve cart items with individual subtotals and cart total. Must return itemized breakdown with per-item subtotals and overall cart total.
add.location: Section 5: API Specifications - Shopping Cart APIs
add.rationale: Story requires specific response structure including individual subtotals and cart total calculation. LLD must document the complete response schema.

add.description: Update quantity of specific cart item. Must support quantity modification with automatic recalculation.
add.location: Section 5: API Specifications - Shopping Cart APIs
add.rationale: Story specifies this exact endpoint for quantity updates. LLD must document path parameters, request body, and recalculation trigger.

add.description: Remove specific item from cart. Must handle item removal and trigger total recalculation.
add.location: Section 5: API Specifications - Shopping Cart APIs
add.rationale: Story requires this specific endpoint for item removal. LLD must document the deletion logic and side effects.

add.description: Current price snapshot field in CartItem entity to capture product price at time of addition to cart. This ensures price consistency even if product price changes later.
add.rationale: Story explicitly requires 'current Price Snapshot' in CartItem entity. This is critical for maintaining price integrity during checkout process.

add.description: Implement automatic recalculation of item subtotals and cart total upon any quantity mutation (add, update, remove operations). This must be triggered synchronously with cart modifications.
add.location: Section 3.3: Shopping Cart Module - Business Logic
add.rationale: Story mandates 'Automatic recalculation of subtotal and total upon any quantity mutation.' LLD must specify the calculation algorithm and trigger points.

add.item: Empty Cart State Handling with UI Redirection
add.description: When cart is empty, system must trigger specific UI state that displays 'continue shopping' link/redirection. This logic must be documented in both backend response and frontend handling.
add.location: Section 3.3: Shopping Cart Module - Business Logic
add.rationale: Story requires 'Empty cart state must trigger specific UI redirection (continue shopping link).' LLD must specify the empty state detection and response structure.

add.description: Detailed specification of Cart View Interface component including layout, data binding, and interaction patterns for displaying cart items, quantities, subtotals, and total.
add.location: Section 3.3: Shopping Cart Module - Frontend Components
add.rationale: Story identifies 'Cart View Interface' as required presentation layer component. LLD must document component structure and responsibilities.

add.item: Empty Cart View with Redirection Link
add.description: Specification of Empty Cart View component that displays when cart has no items, including the 'continue shopping' redirection link and its behavior.
add.location: Section 3.3: Shopping Cart Module - Frontend Components
add.rationale: Story explicitly requires 'Empty Cart View with Redirection Link' as presentation layer component. LLD must document this specific UI state.

add.description: Detailed specification of the interaction handler that manages add-to-cart user actions, including API calls, loading states, error handling, and success feedback.
add.location: Section 3.3: Shopping Cart Module - Frontend Components
add.rationale: Story requires 'Add to Cart Interaction Handler' component. LLD must document event handling, API integration, and user feedback mechanisms.

add.description: Specification of Quantity Updater Component including UI controls (increment/decrement buttons or input field), validation rules, and real-time update behavior.
add.location: Section 3.3: Shopping Cart Module - Frontend Components
add.rationale: Story identifies 'Quantity Updater Component' as required presentation layer component. LLD must document component interface and update logic.

add.description: Explicit documentation of how ShoppingCart entity is bound to user session or user ID, including session management strategy and persistence rules.
add.rationale: Story specifies 'ShoppingCart (Entity bound to user session or ID)'. LLD must clarify the binding mechanism and lifecycle management.
